Title: Tattered Books
Text: It seems like the Hoochiefs here have split into two groups, with the two leaders of the old and new factions fighting for control of this cave territory! The ones on the left are launching a fierce attack on the right! A successful uppercut, beautiful! Awesome! Now the gorilla on the right stumbled a bit, let's see... Great! Stability, stability! He regained his balance with a strong will! Great job! A sweeping kick...oh no, it failed! The opponent dodged it and the gorilla on the right fell to the ground instead. Ahh... Let's see what happens next...
